description: This file initializes an Agent with Postgres storage and DuckDuckGo tools, then runs two queries to demonstrate functionality.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with storage and tools.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent sessions in a PostgreSQL database.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response to a given prompt.
